full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/17/2023 OPTIONAL FORM 230 (English) (Rev. 6-82) Page 2 24. Personal financial resources (a) Cash (c) Real estate (value) Rs. 7 LACS (b) Bank deposits YES (d) Other (describe) 25. Father's name, address date and place of birth (If deceased, so state giving year of death) LATE SR. SINGH JAWANDHA DIED 10th JUNE 1954 26. Mother's maiden name, address date and place of birth (If deceased, so state giving year of death) LATE MRS. JAI KAUR DIED NEARLY 63 YEARS AGO 27 Name address and relationship of nevt of kin in FOIA (b)(6) 28. List all places of residence for 6 months or more since your 16th birthday City or town Province Country Dates (From-To) Calling or occupation RAMPURA PHUL PUNJAB INDIA SINCE BIRTH 1985 FARMING DELHI U.T. INDIA FROM 1985 to DATE 29. List all organizations you are now or have been a member of or affiliated with since your 16th birthday (Include professional, vocational, social, and political organizations) Type of membership and Name and address Dates (From-To) office held, if any NOT APPLICABLE 30. List all languages, including your own, that you can speak, read, and write Language Speak Read Write PUNJABI, URDIS, ENGLISH PUNJABI, URDU PBI., URDU ENGLISH, PBI URDU ENGLISH 31. Inclusive dates of previous residence in or visits to the United States (Give type of visa or status) (If never, so state) NEVER 32. Have you ever been treated in a hospital, institution, or elsewhere for a mental disorder, drug addiction, or Yes No alcoholism? (If answer is Yes, explain) 33. Have you ever been arrested, convicted, or confined in a prison, or have you ever been placed in a poorhouse Yes No or other charitable institution? (If answer is Yes, explain) 34. Have you ever been the beneficiary of a pardon, amnesty, rehabilitation decree, other act of clemency, or Yes No similar action? (If answer is Yes, explain) 35. Have you ever applied for a visa to enter the United States? (If answer is Yes, state where and when, whether Yes No you applied for a nonimmigrant or an immigrant visa, and whether the visa was issued or refused) NON IMMIGRANT VISA, 16 SEP.1987 12th NOV-1987 36. Have you been refused admission to the United States during the last 12 months? (If answer is Yes, explain) Yes No 37. Have you ever registered with a draft board under United States Selective Service Laws? Yes No (If answer is Yes, explain) 38. Have you ever applied for relief from training and service in the United States Armed Forces or departed from Yes No or remained outside the United States to avoid or evade military service? (If answer is Yes, explain) 39. Do you intend to enter the United States from Canada, Mexico, or an island adjacent to the United States Yes No within 2 years after arrival in Canada, Mexico, or such adjacent island? (If answer is Yes, give the name of the transportation company by which you entered or intend to enter Canada, Mexico, or such island)
